item.title: Here. Now. And everything in between.
item.description: Nov, 2020 I have been in Patna for around 6 months. A lot has happened. But, the initial dissatisfaction of wasting my life here has evaporated away. I put in the effort of getting in touch with my old friends a month ago, and life has been entertaining enough since then. I gave a shot to online dating at the same time and got in touch with a couple of fairly interesting people.
